title: (x) help identify this logo font! / rounded Bauhaus sausage style; techno - similar to ITC Bauhaus, Blippo; Megahertz {Florian}
content:
I need help identifying this font in my client's logo. I am redesigning his website, and need to use it!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [abc.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323001718/http:/typophile.com/files/abc.jpg) | 28.02 KB |
author: amargolis21

comments.content:
Hi Andy,  
welcome to Typophile.

You can find a number of typefaces that resemble your sample in the [Bauhaus-style Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323001718/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces1.html) by Mike Yanega; e.g. ITC Bauhaus or Blippo Bold. You might have to do the rounded terminals yourself, though.  
F
Thank you so much!!! Thats perfect!
can you help me identify the font used in "vending products" in the updated logo i attached? thanks!
